title: The Next BioShock: What Do We Expect? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.11.20
description:
The next BioShock is taking place in a new, fantastical world. Blessing and Imran talk about what that means for the series and more! 
 
Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
:: - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:34 - What do we expect from the next BioShock game?
00:14:00 - Companies Really Want Their Own Crossover Skins in Fall Guys - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:20:00 - The Last of Us Part 2 is getting a new, huge update - Jonathan Dornbush @ IGN
00:28:00 - Goldeneye 64 remake has been shut down - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:35:24 - Yoshinoro Ono is leaving Capcom - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:41:41 - A Greg Joint: Daybreak has acquired Cold Iron Studios, and is publishing their New Alien Game - press release
00:42:48 - Out today
00:47:15 -  QUIP
00:48:26 -  KLARNA
 Reader mail   -
00:52:30 - Do we know if publishers sign a contract preventing them from going to the competition's offering when they join Game Pass or PS+? - Mike
00:55:52 - With Media Molecule showcasing a Ratchet & Clank creation in Dreams by a developer at Insomniac, does this mean Sony is more open to players creating things based on established IP’s they own?  - MaDogNik96 (from Massachusetts)
00:59:38 - Squad Up: Cameron Kirnes(PlayStation) - ckirnes20
01:01:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary Whitta
